room_title: Escape room "S3R1AL" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: This place is amazing! I have completed all 3 of their rooms and all were very fun experiences. The newest room S3R1AL really raises the bar for escape games in the DC area. It is easily the best room I have experienced. If you are thinking about trying an Escape Room for the first time or looking for a new one to check out do yourself a favor and go book the S3R1AL room now!

room_title: Escape room "S3R1AL" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: We had an amazing time at Exit Plan last night. The staff is super friendly and obviously love working there. They have a beautiful waiting room where you watch a short video before entering your room. We chose Serial, it was awesome! I've been to another escape room in DC and this one definitely was as good without the long drive.

room_title: Escape room "S3R1AL" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: My friends surprised me for my birthday and it was a complete blast! I highly recommend this adventure for a great time! We did Serial and it was awesome, we definitely plan to go back!

room_title: Escape room "S3R1AL" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: S3R1AL was my whole group's first escape room and it was fantastic.I especially liked how enthusiastic and engaged the staff was afterwards. Made it all the better, and made me a little envious of their job.

room_title: Escape room "S3R1AL" by Exit Plan in Washington, D.C.
review: I've been wanting to try an escape room and Exit Plan was by far the best one to try first. Very welcoming. Serial was awesome. Great times with friends. My husband and I are still talking about it. Definitely planning to come back.
